description: Cluster designed for tagging OSINT artifacts with relevant strategic framework information. Specifically for Block-H, these tags are related to Healthcare Cybersecurity management of organizational assets.
name: HITRUST CSF - Asset Management

values.description: Assets associated with information and information processing facilities are identified and an inventory of these assets are drawn up and maintained.
values.value: OSRS HITRUST CSF Asset Management: 04.a Inventory of Assets

values.description: Assets maintained in the inventory are owned by an inidividual or a designated part of the organization.
values.value: OSRS HITRUST CSF Asset Management: 04.b Ownership of Assets

values.description: Rules for the acceptable use of information and of assets associated with information and information processing facilities are identified, documented and implemented.
values.value: OSRS HITRUST CSF Asset Management: 04.c Acceptable Use of Assets

values.description: Employees and external party users return all of the organizational assets in their possession upon termination of their employment, contract or agreement.
values.value: OSRS HITRUST CSF Asset Management: 04.d Return of Assets

values.description: Information is classified in terms of legal requirements, value, criticality and sensitivity to unauthorized disclosure or modification.
values.value: OSRS HITRUST CSF Asset Management: 04.e Classification of Information

values.description: The development of an appropriate set of procedures for information labeling and implemented in accordance with the information classification scheme adopted by the organization.
values.value: OSRS HITRUST CSF Asset Management: 04.f Labeling of Information

values.description: Assets are handled in accordance with the information classification scheme adopted by the organization.
values.value: OSRS HITRUST CSF Asset Management: 04.g Handling of Asset

values.description: Removable media are managed in accordance with the classification scheme adopted by the organization.
values.value: OSRS HITRUST CSF Asset Management: 04.h Management of Removable Media

values.description: Media is disposed of securely when no longer required.
values.value: OSRS HITRUST CSF Asset Management: 04.i Disposal of Media

values.description: Media containing information are protected against unauthorized access, misuse or corruption during transportation.
values.value: OSRS HITRUST CSF Asset Management: 04.j Physical Media Transfer

values.description: System documentation is protected against unauthorized access.
values.value: OSRS HITRUST CSF Asset Management: 04.k Security of System Documentation
